title: Politics fail to stop massacres, fight over guns pervades primaries
description: Greg Bluestein, political reporter for The Atlanta Journal-Constitution, and Mark Murray, NBC News Political Unit senior editor and co-author of First Read, join Chuck to talk about the results from Tuesday night’s primaries and the killing of schoolchildren in Texas.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
content:encoded: Greg Bluestein, political reporter for The Atlanta Journal-Constitution, and Mark Murray, NBC News Political Unit senior editor and co-author of First Read, join Chuck to talk about the results from Tuesday night’s primaries and the killing of schoolchildren in Texas.
